bach.DataFrame.drop¶

DataFrame.drop(labels=None, index=None, columns=None, level=None, inplace=False, errors='raise')[source]¶

Drop columns from the DataFrame

Parameters

  • labels – not supported

  • index – not supported

  • columns – the list of columns to drop.

  • level – not supported

  • inplace – update the current DataFrame or return a new DataFrame.

  • errors – ‘raise’ or ‘ignore’ missing key errors.

Returns

DataFrame without the removed columns or None if inplace=True.
